content: I found a case where the error message sends the user in circles. Is this a known issue? The error should mention the lifetime associated with Foo. https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=18c7e5f2d6759033eb01f981b5d07ccb
I don't understand what the solution is supposed to be here

Here, this example is probably more clear.
https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=stable&mode=debug&edition=2018&gist=d9ed6c63fb78836e1342f24eb0a83a12

whatever is going on here is currently an enigma to me :thinking: and
I don't know if there is a name for when a sequence of error messages
misdirect the user into a loop
A user-error-compiler-error-infinite-loop? :laughing: Well after more digging I think there are plenty of open issues around these sorts of errors already so I'll forget it.

I haven't looked into it much, was there any of them that you
found interesting?
